name: serenya-backend
description: AWS serverless backend for Serenya AI Health Agent

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=prod
scripts.deploy:enhanced: npm run build && cdk deploy EnhancedSerenyaBackend-dev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:enhanced:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy EnhancedSerenyaBackend-prod --require-approval never
scripts.validate:pre-deploy: npm run build && npm run cdk:synth
scripts.test:security: npm run validate:infrastructure && echo 'Security validation passed'
scripts.test:dynamodb: npm run build && cdk deploy --app 'node dist/test-dynamodb-app.js' SerenyaDynamoDBConnectivityTest --require-approval never
scripts.test:dynamodb:invoke: aws lambda invoke --function-name $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name SerenyaDynamoDBConnectivityTest --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`TestFunctionName`].OutputValue' --output text --region eu-west-1) --region eu-west-1 /tmp/dynamodb-test-result.json && cat /tmp/dynamodb-test-result.json

author: Serenya Health
